title: The new Raspberry Pi Pico W is just $6
description:
The Pico W adds WiFi to the already-popular Pico, and the price is right.

Find out more about the Pico W: https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-pico/

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy

2nd Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/GeerlingEngineering

Mentioned in this video (some links are affiliate links):

  - GitHub repo - Garage Door Sensor: https://github.com/geerlingguy/pico-w-garage-door-sensor
  - Enforcer Garage Door contact switch: https://amzn.to/3I1WQX6
  - ESPHome Pico Support: https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2022/esphome-on-raspberry-pi-pico
  - Thonny: https://thonny.org
  - Wio RP2040 by Seeed Studio: https://www.seeedstudio.com/Wio-RP2040-Module-p-4932.html
  - Arduino Nano RP2040 Connect: https://amzn.to/3y3rJWG
  - D1 Mini dev board (ESP8266): https://amzn.to/3ubMGxy
  - PicoCart64 Project for N64: https://github.com/kbeckmann/PicoCart64/tree/develop
